creator: stoledo@tau.ac.il
text:
The documentation for the sync task should explicitly say what does the sync do
about files in the source directory but which are excluded from the fileset. Do
they get deleted from the target if they exist there, or are they simply left
alone, not participating in the sync operation?

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
short answer for you, they get deleted.

longer answer will go into a documentation patch later.
